data.name: Preset Message 1
data.message: “Maybe, just maybe, there is no purpose in life… but if you linger a while longer in this world, you might discover something of value in it.”

data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “The body ages, but the mind is immortal.”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “It’s human nature not to realize the true value of something unless they lose it.”

data.name: Preset Message 4
data.message: “I want to master all techniques to understand the truth of this world.”

data.name: Preset Message 5
data.message: “Hate only gives birth to even more hate.”

data.name: Preset Message 7
data.message: “When there is a true desire in the heart and that desire is strong… That is when he finds real strength that even he did not know he had!”
